name: Tacoma Open Data
description: Tacoma Open Data features a wide critical information, including: Bridge Data (WSDOT), City Council Districts, Equity Index, Fire and Police Data, and more. It is a living platform actively curated and updated by City departments, and is available online, in an open format, with no legal encumbrances on use or reuse, available for all to access and download in full, without fees or registration. Data profiles are tailored for specific user groups, with over 70 different data sets and more to come.
data_themes: Justice, legal system and public safety
